Title: Establishes the eating disorders in children task force
Summary: Establishes the eating disorders in children task force to study and create a standardized approach to, and develop best practices and guidelines for awareness, recognition, and treatment of eating disorders in children.
LawCode: Add ยง30.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing the eating disorders in children task force
